content: I have been in line to Publish in Trifolia since yesterday afternoon. In the past, I have been told this was due to heavy use of the Publisher, but my wait times in the past have not exceeded 2-3 hours. This is occurring in the SDOH CC IG https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-sdoh-cc/. Any suggestions for resolution?
have you checked in with the Trifolia app team?
Okay. I have now done that. Thank you.

It seems that for some reason the queue in ToF is getting hung up. I'm not sure if it's because the IG Publisher is finishing unexpectedly and ToF is failing to remove the queue associated with the exited IG Publisher, or if something else is going on. We're investigating... I'll likely need to add some management functionality to monitor the queue a little more closely...
in the meantime, I will restart ToF to reset the queue
I've started a thread in the #trifolia-on-fhir stream for this issue.
